confirm.title: Your account has been successfully confirmed!

success.title: Success
success.description: Your deposit is successful! Money is already on your balance.

forgot.title: Forgot password?
forgot.description: Enter your email address and we will send you a password reset link.

cancelBonus.title: Confirm bonus cancel
cancelBonus.activeBonusDescription: All your winnings will be lost. Are you sure you want to cancel this bonus?
cancelBonus.issuedBonusDescription: Are you sure you want to cancel this bonus?

error.title: Error
error.description:
Sorry, something went wrong.
Please, try again.

changeActiveBonus.title: Confirm bonus update
changeActiveBonus.description: The status of the currently active bonus will change to Cancelled. Are you sure you want to activate this bonus?

registrationCancel.title: Are you sure you want to cancel your registration?
registrationCancel.bonusText: Sign-up takes only a minute and welcome you with up to *5000 mBTC + 300 FS*

registration.title: Join Slotsbet
registration.agreeEmailLabel: I agree to receive bonus & marketing emails

displayInFiat.title: Display in fiat
displayInFiat.description: Please note that these are currency approximations. All bets & transactions will be settled in the crypto equivalent. For further details feel free to contact our live support.

deposit.addressDescription: This is your personal address for deposits. Your funds will be available as soon as they pass through the necessary confirmations.
deposit.title: Deposit

addCashLimit.chooseCurrencyError: Please, select your currency for new deposit limit
addCashLimit.hint: The restriction takes effect instantly. You can reduce your limit at any time, this change will take effect immediately. You can increase the limit, however, in order for this change to take effect, you need 24 hours. Cancellation of the deposit limit takes 24 hours. After the limit is exceeded, you will receive an email notification.
addCashLimit.label: New deposit limit

editCashLimit.greaterAmountTitle: New limit sum is bigger than the previous one
editCashLimit.hint: Email confirmation will be needed. The change will be applied in 24 hours.
editCashLimit.greaterAmountDescription: Please, check your email and follow the received confirmation link to activate limit change.
editCashLimit.label: Edit daily deposit limit

selfExlusionConfirm.updateDescription: Are you sure you want to set Self Exclusion limit? During the set period you will not be able to log into your account.

exceededLimitConfirm.label: Edit your limits
exceededLimitConfirm.description: Sorry, but you can't make deposits for now because you have active limits.
